misc: Has a habit of getting lost on golf course grounds
Does not spit in the glass
biography: Here is a biography of Janne, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his generous spirit and unwavering commitment to fair play. Janne has graced the fairways of this tournament on seven previous occasions, representing his home club, Revontuli Golf, with distinction.

Janne is a competitor in the truest sense of the word. While victory has eluded him thus far, his presence enriches the event. One cannot help but admire Janne, even if one has also noticed that he tends to get lost on the golf course grounds. His fellow golfers find it endearing, in a way.

Off the course, Janne is known for his impeccable manners and strong moral compass. A true gentleman, he embodies the spirit of the game in every aspect of his life. He also makes sure to never spit in the glass.

As Janne prepares for his eighth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, anticipation builds to see how his dedication and hard work will translate on the course. Whether he is finally able to bring home the trophy, one thing is certain: Janne's participation will undoubtedly leave a lasting impact on all those involved.
